div.p: This setup is for sports clubs that rent courts to their players, handle some basic gears and have a cafeteria.
As a small company, The Club still has quite a lot of activities to manage and does all this with Odoo.
Below are the detailed flows they use on a daily basis.

ul.li: Appointments App: Enable members to book courts or coaching sessions online 24/7, reducing front-desk workload and double-bookings.
Planning App: Optimize facility usage and staff schedules, ensuring the right resources are available for peak times and tournaments.
Point of Sale App: Streamline operations in your cafeteria and pro shop, handling sales of food, drinks, and sports gear with ease.
Inventory App: Keep track of rental equipment and retail stock, ensuring you always have the necessary gear and refreshments on hand.
Website & eCommerce App: specific your club's activities online and sell merchandise or memberships directly to your community.
CRM App: Manage member relationships and track potential leads for new sign-ups or corporate sponsorships.
Social Marketing App: Promote club events, tournaments, and special offers across social media to keep your community engaged.

template.p: The Club Sells sport gears through 2 channels:

a) Equipment can be bought on the Club eShop, with a paid delivery at home or a free pick up at the Club, or directly from the Club, through their dedicated "Shop" Point of Sale. When rackets are bought on the eShop, a basic up-sell is suggested: Add a towel or some balls to your order.
b) For players that need something on the spot, the SHOP POS can also be used.

a) The Club has a bar where players can grab something to eat between games or have a beer.
It can be accessed in
Point of Sales > Bar and contains some basic products.
Customers can pay by through different means, including by adding the note to their account.
b) Planning for the Bar is also handled from Odoo. Simple recurring shifts are created and assigned to the staff members.

There are two appointment types configured for the Club.
a) The first one "Court Booking" allows players to book a court for a session of 60 minutes. Slots start every 30 minutes.
b) The other one, "Friday night free play" is only available on Fridays and allows player to join other games.
template.blockquote: Notes: This is because the courts are configured as shareable. As long as a free spot is left, players can register and share the resource (=the courts) with others.
template.p: On top of that, employees working behind the counter can also take phone calls and book some courts. For this, they use the Appointments > Resource Schedule menu.
